snippet: For the 24th time this season, the Mets lost after holding a lead as Jeurys Familia allowed four runs in the eighth inning with the winning run scoring on an error by third baseman Eric Campbell.
abstract: Atlanta Braves defeat New York Mets, 5-3; Mets star David Wright will avoid disabled list, despite bruised rotator cuff.
lead_paragraph: For the 24th time this season, the Mets lost after holding a lead as Jeurys Familia allowed four runs in the eighth inning with the winning run scoring on an error by third baseman Eric Campbell.

headline.print_headline: Mets Waste Lead in Loss to Braves
headline.main: Mets Waste Lead in Loss to Braves
